from enigma import eSize, ePoint, getDesktop deskwidth = getDesktop(0).size().width() bswindow_horizontal = 14 bswindow_top = 48 bswindow_bottom = 20 offset_bswindow = 10 deskheight = getDesktop(0).size().height() offset_horizontal = 14
# text textsize_org = self["text"].getSize() textwidth_add = 20 textsize = (textsize_org[0] + textwidth_add, textsize_org[1] + textwidth_add) textwidth = textsize[0] textheight = self["text"].instance.calculateSize().height() lineheight = 27 offset_text_horizontal = 73 min_textwidth = 400 if ((lineheight * 2) > textheight): textheight = lineheight * 2 if (min_textwidth > textwidth): textwidth = min_textwidth full_textwidth = offset_text_horizontal + textwidth
# list listwidth = 0 listheight = 0 list_itemheight = 30 if self.list: try: for i in self.list: if len(i[0]) > 0: listwidth = len(i[0]) listheight = len(self.list) * list_itemheight except: pass
if (listheight > 0): offset_text_to_list = 40 offset_bottom = 14 else: offset_text_to_list = 0 offset_bottom = 30
# window if (full_textwidth > listwidth): windowwidth = full_textwidth + (offset_horizontal * 2) else: full_textwidth = listwidth windowwidth = full_textwidth + (offset_horizontal * 2)
max_windowheight = deskheight - bswindow_top - bswindow_bottom - (offset_bswindow * 2) windowheight = textheight + offset_text_to_list + listheight + offset_bottom if (windowheight > deskheight): textheight = max_windowheight - offset_text_to_list - listheight - offset_bottom windowheight = textheight + offset_text_to_list + listheight + offset_bottom
max_windowwidth = deskwidth - (bswindow_horizontal * 2) - (offset_bswindow * 2) if (windowwidth > max_windowwidth): textwidth = (max_windowwidth - offset_text_horizontal) - (offset_horizontal * 2) listwidth = max_windowwidth
windowsize = (windowwidth, windowheight)
# resize self.instance.resize(eSize(* windowsize))
# resize label textsize = (textwidth, textheight) self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(* textsize))
# move list listsize = (windowwidth - (offset_horizontal * 2), listheight) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(offset_horizontal, textheight + offset_text_to_list)) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(* listsize))
# center window new_windowwidth = windowsize[0] new_windowheight = windowsize[1] self.instance.move(ePoint(int(deskwidth - new_windowwidth) / 2, (int(deskheight - new_windowheight) / 2) + ((bswindow_top - bswindow_bottom) / 2)))
from enigma import eSize, ePoint, getDesktop
deskwidth = getDesktop(0).size().width() deskheight = getDesktop(0).size().height() textsize_org = self["text"].getSize()
textwidth_add = 20 textsize = (textsize_org[0] + textwidth_add, textsize_org[1]) textwidth = textsize[0] textheight = textsize[1] height_offset = 8 middle_offset = 30 bottom_offset = 8 listitemheight = 30 width_offset = 10 windowwidth_min = 650
# improvise listwidth if textheight > 30: windowwidth_min = 768
# calc listheight count = len(self.list) if count > 15: count = 15 listheight = listitemheight * count
# calc windowwidth windowwidth = width_offset * 2 + textwidth if (windowwidth_min > windowwidth): windowwidth = windowwidth_min
# calc windowheight if textheight > 0: windowheight = height_offset + textheight + middle_offset + listheight + bottom_offset else: windowheight = height_offset + listheight + bottom_offset
# resize window windowsize = (windowwidth, windowheight) self.instance.resize(eSize(*windowsize))
# resize text self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize))
# move list listsize = (windowwidth - width_offset * 2, listheight) if textheight > 0: self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(width_offset, height_offset + textheight + middle_offset)) else: self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(width_offset, height_offset)) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize))
# center window self.instance.move(ePoint((deskwidth - windowwidth)/2, (deskheight - windowheight)/2 + 12))

from enigma import eSize, ePoint, getDesktop
deskwidth = getDesktop(0).size().width() deskheight = getDesktop(0).size().height()
height_offset = 8 bottom_offset = 8 listitemheight = 30 width_offset = 10 windowwidth = 650
# calc listheight count = len(self.list) if count > 15: count = 15 listheight = listitemheight * count
# calc windowheight windowheight = height_offset + listheight + bottom_offset
# resize window windowsize = (windowwidth, windowheight) self.instance.resize(eSize(*windowsize))
# move list listsize = (windowwidth - width_offset * 2, listheight) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(width_offset, height_offset)) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize))
# center window self.instance.move(ePoint((deskwidth - windowwidth)/2, (deskheight - windowheight)/2 + 12))
